TopicTitle: cBBp SPC Pack v0.4: Fixed Failcan RCS and added some adapter pieces. Enjoy.

Articles.Content: Will you go back and add the interior models when the support for them is properly released?

in soem none kosmos related news i had a revlation the other day.I realized that the Durgun hardly looks right. in reality it should look ike a very large pod. but in this game windows seem to be what people scale size on. so i have redued the window size of the Durgun. God i forgot how nice it is to fly. ook off. landed with out chutes

Hopefully one day the whole pack will get a nice repainting. but untill then I only have docking ring over haul and logo changes instore.

You\'re right; the smaller windows make the pod look bigger than it did before. That\'s interesting...

On another note, are those tri-parachutes from back a page or two the right size for the stock CM (and if so, can I have them)?

it is for the VA capsule. the main capsule for the KOSMOS pack. it can be found here. it ahould work on the stock pod. they are the same sizes. but the VA pod is like durgun in that it is self contained. it can deorbit all by itself

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=7178.0

gonna put this mod on the shelf for now. KOSMOS is more popular, has less complaints. extremely modular, has alot of work to do still, will have the angara rocket system which will be more modular than this system. once KOSMOS is more completed I might overhaul this whole mod with custom dlls and such. but for now no too much on my plate.
Dangit; I was hoping now that plugins and such are implemented, that you could get the KerbinStar working!
